question.questionText: Look at the rubbings of 2 different fabrics. What do the rubbings tell us about the different textures of these 2 fabrics?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Fabric A is smoother and has a finer texture. Fabric B is rougher and has a coarser texture.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: They are rough. A has bumpy dots. B has bumpy dots and lines.
A is like lines and B has squares and lines.
B looks like it is bumpy and A looks like is smooth.
A is probably smoother than B.
